## Overlay.cancel property

Enables or disables ways in which the user can cancel (i.e., hide) the overlay. key = Hitting the Esc key button = Clicking the X button click = Clicking outside of the overlay

**Signature:**

```typescript
cancel: {
        key: boolean;
        button: boolean;
        click: boolean;
    };
```
